strings: <se_high>Jessica: Are these some kind of ruins?
<se_high>Jessica: It doesn't look like anyone's been here for a long time. What a lonely place.
<se_low>Yangus: Jessica stuck wiv us on some difficult paths back there wivout moanin', eh?
<se_low>Yangus: To be 'onest, I'm well surprised. I 'ad 'er pegged as the type to give up pretty quick, like. Thought she'd be on 'er way back 'ome by now.
<se_low>Yangus: She's quite tough for a posh bird, ain't she?
<se_high>Jessica: We should hurry over to the abbey. I don't want to keep the ring that creep gave me a minute longer than I have to!
<se_low>Yangus: Jessica stuck wiv us on some difficult paths back there wivout moanin', eh?
<se_low>Yangus: To be 'onest, I'm well surprised. I 'ad 'er pegged as the type to give up pretty quick, like. Thought she'd be on 'er way back 'ome by now.
<se_low>Yangus: She's quite tough for a posh bird, ain't she?

<se_high>Jessica: Old ruins upstream... A stone marker...
Yep, this has to be the place.
<se_high>Jessica: Look!

<se_high>Jessica: See that crest carved on the stone marker?
It's the same as the one on the ring!
Let's have a closer look!
<se_low>Yangus: We should be able find a path to the Abbot's island 'round 'ere, right?
<se_low>Yangus: I ain't got a clue where to start lookin' for it, mind.

<se_high>Jessica: How did that happen?
Maybe it's some kind of holy power, or something?
<se_high>Jessica: Let's leave it for now, <hero>.

<se_low>Yangus: Blimey! Wot's goin' on!
Looks like somefin's burnin'!
<se_low>Yangus: Still, these abbeys do like their tricks an' traps, eh?
<se_high>Jessica: That poor soul has been suffering alone all these years...

<se_high>Jessica: It's time to put an end to his pain.
Right, <hero>?

<se_low>Yangus: Huh! I let me guard down back there!
Who'd have thought a monster like that'd get the better of the legend'ry Yangus!?

<se_low>Yangus: We don't 'ave time for this neither!
We've gotta get to the Abbot's room pronto!

<se_high>Jessica: Come on!
Let's use the ring to open the entrance!

<se_low>Yangus: If we stick that ring in the stone marker, I reckon it'll show us where we gotta go.
Come on, guv, 'urry!
<se_high>Jessica: Dhoulmagus must have started that fire!
<se_high>Jessica: We'd better hurry through the ruins and get over there!

<se_low>Yangus: It's taken a bit of a while gettin' 'ere, eh?
I 'ope ev'ryone at the abbey's okay.

<se_high>Jessica: I can't get used to this place.
It really makes me uncomfortable.
<se_high>Jessica: So let's hurry up and get out of here!

<se_low>Yangus: That Dhoulmagus is a nasty piece o' work, eh?
I can't stand the bloke.
<se_low>Yangus: But that's a good thing, I reckon. If I 'ate 'im, I won't 'ave no come-puncture about knockin' 'is block off!

<se_high>Jessica: What could we have done differently, the first time we saw Dhoulmagus?
Did we make some kind of mistake?
<se_high>Jessica: I know there's no point in moping over the past, but I can't get it out of my head. If there's one thing I can't stand, it's having regrets.
<se_low>Yangus: Y'know, apart from the abbey, there's also a big town an' a castle on this cont'nent.

<se_low>Yangus: They're both a fair old way away, mind.
We should get some shut-eye at the inn before we get goin'.

<se_def>Angelo: This place is filthy.
It's hard to keep your footing in the mud, and there are dead bodies everywhere.

<se_def>Angelo: ...You did well to make it through here.
I take my hat off to you.
<se_high>Jessica: Um, don't you think we should make the ship our first priority? We need to go to Trodain Castle and find out more about it.
<se_high>Jessica: I guess it's okay to take a detour, but we shouldn't waste too much time.
<se_low>Yangus: It was that Dhoulmagus who covered the castle wiv thorns then, eh? There's prob'ly monsters inside.
<se_low>Yangus: Maybe we should go an' do a bit of confessin' in church first, guv. Make sure this Goddess is on our side an' all that. Better safe than sorry!
<se_def>Angelo: You know, we've still got unfinished business at Trodain Castle.

<se_def>Angelo: The troll king said we should go to the library and find out about the ship.
Don't want to disobey orders now!
<se_high>Jessica: I really hate to say this, but I think coming all the way out here was a big mistake.
<se_high>Jessica: Let's go back into town. We can get more information that way. Don't you think?

<se_low>Yangus: Where's that 'arp, eh? I dunno.
Can't see anyfin' like that round 'ere.
<se_low>Yangus: Still, I s'pose we'll come across it sooner or later if we keep ploddin' along.

<se_def>Angelo: Are you trying to break the world record for walking the furthest or something?
I think a bit of focus may be required here. Right?
<se_high>Jessica: Sounds like the thief who stole the Moonshadow harp is somewhere beyond that tunnel we saw in Ascantha Castle.
<se_high>Jessica: We'd better hurry up and give chase before it's too late! Come on!

<se_high>Jessica: They're pretty strong for a bunch of moles!
This is crazy!

<se_high>Jessica: We can't walk away empty-handed.
Let's go back and show them what we're really made of!
<se_low>Yangus: There's this place north of Ascantha surrounded by mountains. The only way to get there's by diggin' an 'ole.
<se_low>Yangus: Not a bad place for a thief's 'ideout, I reckon. Maybe that's where the geezer who stole the Moonshadow 'arp is.
<se_low>Yangus: Let's get a move on back to Ascantha Castle!
<se_low>Yangus: We ain't lettin' them moles keep the Moonshadow 'arp!
<se_low>Yangus: Moles... I dunno!
<se_low>Yangus: Just thinkin' about that awful racket the fat one made is enough to bring me dinner back up! Uuurgh!
<se_def>Angelo: I know the King said he'd summon his men and all that...

<se_def>Angelo: But it's King Pavan, right?
Hardly the most dynamic person we've ever met.
We'd better take care of this ourselves.
<se_def>Angelo: These moles won't get the better of us. Right?
<se_def>Angelo: We'd better make sure we show them who's boss this time, or we'll never live it down!
<se_high>Jessica: We've got the harp! Now all we have to do is take it back to Ishmahri and he can use it to get the ship moving again.
<se_high>Jessica: This is so exciting! Come on, let's hurry! Back to Trodain Castle and into that weird moon world!

<se_low>Yangus: I've been thinkin'.
We ain't never really been on a long boat journey together before, eh, guv?
<se_low>Yangus: Shame we can't rustle up a few deckchairs an' enjoy it a bit more, but I s'pose chasin' Dhoulmagus comes first.

<se_low>Yangus: Come on then, guv.
Let's go an' give the 'arp back to that Itchy-Marie bloke.

<se_def>Angelo: What was it that he said, that Ishmahri character?
Something about awakening the sea's memories?
<se_def>Angelo: It's rather a strange concept to get your head round... Still, no need for us to bother with the details.
<se_def>Angelo: Let's just head back to Trodain Castle and go through the Moonshadow window in the library.

<se_high>Jessica: Hey. We have a ship now, remember?
It's not like we can't ever come back here again.
<se_high>Jessica: In fact, we can come back whenever we like. So why don't we hop on the ship and head west now?
<se_low>Yangus: So Dhoulmagus come from Farebury to Maella, and then on to the west over the sea.
<se_low>Yangus: Come on then, guv! Let's get the ship 'eaded west!
<se_def>Angelo: I heard that the world's biggest casino is over on the western continent.
<se_def>Angelo: Maybe we could just drop in there on our way? Add a bit of interest to this trailing around after Dhoulmagus.<page>Angelo: After all, all work and no play makes Angelo a dull boy.

<se_low>Yangus: I know Rhapthorne calls 'imself a lord, but it just don't work for me.
Wot is a ‘Lord of Darkness’, anyway?

<se_low>Yangus: I mean, the darkness bit don't sound good, does it? Not for a lord.
...Oh! I get it! It ain't meant to!

<se_high>Jessica: There isn't any reason for us to be here, right?
I think we'd better head back.

<se_def>Angelo: This used to be the abbey, a long time ago.
But no one lives here any more.
<se_def>Angelo: Almost everyone died when the plague swept through the place.
<se_def>Angelo: If we don't defeat Rhapthorne, everywhere will end up looking like this.
<se_high>Jessica: Our most important task is locating Dhoulmagus! That means we don't have time for messing around! Am I making myself clear?

<se_high>Jessica: Let's MOVE, then!
We need to get back to the abbey!
Now!

<se_low>Yangus: I love gettin' away from it all an' 'avin' a nice stroll in the country like this.
Aaah, smell that fresh air!
<se_low>Yangus: ...Anyway, I reckon the Abbot might know a bit about this place, guv.
<se_low>Yangus: Why don't we go to the abbey an' see wot we can find out?
<se_high>Red: Look, wot are we even doin' in a crumby old place like this, eh?
<se_low>Morrie: Argh! ...S-Someone, he just pulled my leg! Who's pulling my leg, ay? WHO? I don't wanna stretch these trouser legs, capice?
